scripts.clean: dotnet restore && dotnet clean && dotnet rimraf **/bin **/obj coverage reports
scripts.build: dotnet r clean && dotnet build -c Release
scripts.format: dotnet r clean && dotnet format Application.sln && dotnet jb cleanupcode --no-build Application.sln --jobs=1 && dotnet roslynator format Application.sln
scripts.test: dotnet r clean && dotnet test -c Debug
scripts.test:coverage: dotnet r clean && dotnet test -c Debug /p:CollectCoverage=true -m:1 && dotnet reportgenerator -reports:./coverage/coverage.cobertura.xml -targetdir:./reports/coverage -reporttypes:Html minimumCoverageThresholds:lineCoverage=0 minimumCoverageThresholds:branchCoverage=0 minimumCoverageThresholds:methodCoverage=0
